com.smarthome.emulator.simulations

Class PerformanceSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.PerformanceSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PerformanceSimulation
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Creates environment for server performance testing. Provides creation of large number of adapters with randomized number of sensors and there values. Also provides possibility to save, load simulation, print simulation logs and display server's responses in chart.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PerformanceSimulation

        public PerformanceSimulation()
        Creates and initializes all visual components needed to perform performance simulation

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()
        Checks if configuration fields are correctly filled, validates filled fields. Then creates given number of adapters with randomized number of sensors and activates all adapters by calling resumeSimulation(). Also disables configuration change

      • stopSimulation

        public void stopSimulation()
        Stops simulation, removes all data generated by simulation, resets chart. Also enables configuration change

      • pauseSimulation

        public void pauseSimulation()
        Sets all adapters to inactive state, stops response chart painting.

      • resumeSimulation

        public void resumeSimulation()
        Sets all adapters to active state,starts response chart painting

      • pauseSensors

        public void pauseSensors()
        Stops all sensors on all adapters from sending new messages

      • resumeSensors

        public void resumeSensors()
        Allow all sensors on all adapters to send new messages

      • printLogs

        public void printLogs()
        Merges all logs into one document and after confirming print dialog prints this document.

      • incrementSensorsCount

        public static void incrementSensorsCount()
        Increase number of sensors

      • decrementSensorsCount

        public static void decrementSensorsCount()
        Decrease number of sensors

      • showDialog

        public java.lang.String showDialog(java.lang.String title,
                          boolean save)
        Show either save of load dialog returning file name of file to be saved/loaded.
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        save - true for save dialog, false for load dialog
        Returns:
        file name on success, null if no file selected

      • showSavePrintDialog

        public void showSavePrintDialog()
        Show dialog with options to save and print logs, do nothing or cancel dialog. If save and print action is selected, save and print dialogs are shown.

      • onCancel

        private void onCancel()

      • deleteAdapters

        private void deleteAdapters()
        Clears adapters list

      • setDefault

        private void setDefault()
        Sets default values of configuration text fields, creates new ServerPanel , resets generators seeds to null and creates new generators

      • resetSeeds

        private void resetSeeds()
        Sets all generators seeds to null

      • loadSimulationFromXML

        private void loadSimulationFromXML()
        Opens load dialog. From given XML file loads and sets configuration text fields. Also creates new generators from seed loaded from file.

        Shows errors:

        • LOAD_DOC_CREATE if cannot create document from given file
        • LOAD_DOC_READ if cannot read given file
        • LOAD_DOC_PARSE if cannot parse given file
        • FILE_NOT_FOUND if given file was not found

      • saveSimulationToXML

        private void saveSimulationToXML()
        Opens save dialog. To given file saves values from configuration text fields and generators seeds

        Shows errors:

        • SAVE_DOC_CREATE if cannot create document for given file

      • randomizeSensors

        private void randomizeSensors(Adapter adapter)
        Creates randomize amount of sensors for Adapter given as parameter. Also randomizes refresh rate value,signal value, battery value and sensor type value.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter for which should be created sensors
